pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, September 23, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, September 23, 2016:

Montréal, Quebec

10:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend, with Premier Li Keqiang, an event with representatives of the Montréal Canadiens.

Bell Centre
1909 Avenue des Canadiens-de-Montréal
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage in the stands
  • Pooled coverage on the ice
  • All media must arrive no later than 9:40 a.m.
  • Media to arrive at 1225 rue Saint-Antoine O, in locker room #5


11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the 6th China-Canada Business Forum and Luncheon with Premier Li Keqiang.

Palais des congrès de Montréal
Room 710, Ballroom
1001 Place Jean-Paul-Riopelle
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media must arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
  • Media to arrive at 159 rue Saint-Antoine E, 2nd floor


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
